page.description: Marks the current row in the List as deleted. The row is not physically removed from the List until the data are synchronized. If the current row is a new record, then the row is immediately removed from the List.

argument.name: options
argument.description: A JSON object with the properties listed below.

property.name: prompt
property.description: true/false - prompt for confirmation. Default is true.

page.limitations: List Control with Detail View Part
